column1:
MC003: Does your company have controls/systems to secure information stored on mobile computing devices? 

If yes, please describe the tools used.
Required Validation:  Walkthrough inspection of the MDM console to validate controls

Design Elements:
 1. Systems/procedures for preventing local storage of customer data on mobile devices (e.g., email on hand-held devices)
 2. Systems/procedures for protecting data stored locally on mobile devices
 3. Restriction of application downloads to approved app stores
 4. Device registration process
 5. Remote wipe capabilities (e.g., for lost/stolen devices)
column3: Not storing any information in mobile devices.
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does have controls/systems to secure information stored on mobile computing devices in place.

Employees are able to access company email from their mobile devices.

The following design elements are in place:
 3. Restriction of application downloads to approved app stores
    Integral UK Cell Phone Policy.docx [Stage 5] - Page 1

 4. Device registration process
    Integral UK Cell Phone Policy.docx [Stage 5] - Page 1

 5. Remote wipe capabilities (e.g., for lost/stolen devices)
    Integral UK Cell Phone Policy.docx [Stage 5] - Page 1


The following design elements are not applicable:
 1. Systems/procedures for preventing local storage of customer data on mobile devices (e.g., email on hand-held devices) - Integral does not store information on mobile devices.
 2. Systems/procedures for protecting data stored locally on mobile devices

Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response, inquiry with Seeja Jiju, Program Manager on 07/23/2021 and inspection of evidence.
